basics.name: Adeer Khan
basics.research Interest: Motivated towards the implementation of computer vision and Ai in remote sensing and 3d model generation for intelligent infrastructure and urban management.

education.institution: Capital University of Science and Technology, Islamabad, Pakistan
courses: A simple and sustainable approach to structural health monitoring of structures - Final Year Project

work.name: Softoo Pvt. Ltd.
work.summary: Developed and trained machine learning and computer vision models for automatic 3D point cloud generation from imagery, enabling efficient and accurate inspections for oil and gas remote assets.

work.name: McKinsey & Company
work.summary: Developed expertise in strategic thinking, problem-solving, and decision-making through rigorous case studies and practical exercises.

work.name: IEEE CUST Student Branch
work.summary: Led a team of graphic designers to manage IEEE Social Media and other graphical works. Organized over 40 webinars in semesters in coordination with other societies. Organized mega-events such as Al-Funoon Gala and ICSEC. Redesigned IEEE Section Branch Affinity groups logos.

volunteer.summary: Delivered a workshop on Social Uplift through Popular Education Pedagogy. Substitute teacher of junior classes. Held art challenges, spelling bee, and general knowledge and science quiz competitions in the younger classes.

Raising awareness about youth volunteering opportunities across schools. Attended multiple workshops on Reporting and Documenting Volunteer Activities. Started clean-up campaign at Ayub Park, Rawalpindi.

awards.title: Awarded Quaid-e-Azam Gold Medal
awards.awarder: Capital University of Science and Technology
awards.summary: An overall best achiever of the university based on extra and co-curricular activities.

awards.title: National Level Distinction in Final Year Design Project
awards.summary: Awarded 2nd prize at Pakistan Engineering Council’s Engineering Capstone Expo 2022.

awards.title: South Asian Quiz Content CMC Quiz Mania - 5 Participant
awards.summary: Went to Kathmandu, Nepal, to represent Pakistan in South Asian Quiz Content CMC Quiz Mania - 5. The entire contest was telecasted on Nepal Tv.

awards.title: Research Excellence Award
awards.awarder: Capital University of Science and Technology
awards.summary: Based on excellent research achievement at such a young age, was designated as the chair of the Research Excellence Award Ceremony (REA) - 2021.

awards.title: Chancellor's Honor Roll
awards.awarder: Capital University of Science and Technology
awards.summary: Awarded two times for securing 4.0 GPA in two semesters of the Civil Engineering Degree.

awards.title: Distinction in Final Year Design Project
awards.awarder: Capital University of Science and Technology
awards.summary: Awarded 1st Position at the 10th Industrial Open House held by the university.

awards.title: Graphics Head of 16th International Conference on Emerging Technologies (ICET 2021)
awards.awarder: Capital University of Science and Technology
awards.summary: Supervised a team to professionally undertake the graphical work of the conference.

awards.title: Proofreader of the International Conference on Advances in Mechanical Engineering
awards.awarder: Capital University of Science and Technology
awards.summary: Proofreading and structuring of the conference proceedings.

awards.title: Runner Up at SUPARCO World Space Week 2022 Pakistan
awards.awarder: Pakistan Space & Upper Atmosphere Research Commission
awards.summary: Secured 2nd position in SDG Video Contest on Sustainable Human Footprint.

awards.title: FYP Project Displayed at Rawalpindi Chamber Of Commerce And Industry Expo 2022
awards.awarder: Rawalpindi Chamber Of Commerce And Industry
awards.summary: The Project was presented to entrepreneurs, ambassadors, and industry professionals.
